name: DropdownMenu
description: Action menu with items, separators, checkbox items, radio groups, and submenu support

accessibility.screenReader: Trigger announces with aria-haspopup=menu and aria-expanded. Menu uses role=menu. Items use role=menuitem, menuitemcheckbox, or menuitemradio. Type-ahead navigation supported. Submenus expand with ArrowRight.

recommendedUsage: Use for action menus triggered by buttons. Group related actions with labels and separators. Use destructive variant for dangerous actions. Include keyboard shortcuts when applicable.
antiPatterns: Do not use for navigation - use NavigationMenu instead. Avoid deeply nested submenus. Do not use for form field selection - use Select instead.
